text: dontho la umunali tidalipanga kukhala dontho la magazi ndipo dontho lamagazili tidalipanga kukhala mâ€™bulu wa mnofu. Ndipo mnofu umenewu tidaukonza kukhala mafupa ndipo tidakuta mafupa ndi mnofu. Kotero tidamupanga iye kukhala chilengedwe china. odalitsa akhale Mulungu, Namalenga wabwino kwambiri mwa onse
